titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the better defence of the Kings Royall Person, and of this Universitie and city
Proclamations. 1644-05-24
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Oxford, the 24th day of May, ... 1644.
